In the MATTER OF the Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of R.M. & D.M. (Children) and W.M. (Father); W.M. (Father), Appellant-Respondent,
v.
The Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner Court of Appeals Case No. 18A-JT-168 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED July 25, 2018

Affirmed.
